string.text: Find %s for the Pianist
You need to bring tools to the Pianist so that he can upgrade the equipment.

You know, bro, I'm actually a pretty good technician. I can fix both weapons and armor, and even do some upgrades! Well, I would, if the tools were normal. But where can you get them here? Maybe you can help me get a simple set, huh?
I need a set of tools for rough work. It should have tools and oils for working with weapons. If you can get it, I'll be grateful, maybe even pay you!.. Probably.
Great, dude! Oh, sorry, I have nothing to pay you with. But I can give you a good discount!
Find %s for the Pianist
You need to bring tools for delicate work to the Pianist. He needs a more complete set to perform more complex equipment upgrades.
Hey, dude, if you agree to get me a more complete set, you'll get an even bigger discount. Will you help me, pal?
I need tools for delicate work. It should have everything I need. You'll be my brother if you get it for me!

Wow, damn, thanks, bro! Now I'm definitely going to get rich. Damn it, I'm going to be successful!.. Well, if I don't miss this chance. But for now, I can't offer you anything better than a discount. Sorry, pal.
Find %s for the Pianist
You need to bring %s to the Pianist. He needs a unique set to perform even more complex equipment upgrades.
Hey, kid, if you find something worthwhile, I'll give you a discount!
I need calibration tools. They should have everything I need. You'd be like a brother to me if you fetch them!

No way...! Oh, thanks, buddy! Now I'm definitely going to get rich. Damn it, I'll finally become successful!... If, of course, I don't miss this opportunity. But for now, I can't offer you anything better than a discount. Sorry, pal.
%s for Chip
You need to find a set and take it to medic Chip.
I need a good set of medical tools. I can quickly fix minor injuries, but I don't have anything for more serious wounds.
I need a good set of medical tools. I can quickly fix minor injuries, but I don't have anything for more serious wounds.
Thank you, my friend! These tools will save many lives. Thanks again for the tools.
Find %s for Ivanich
You need to bring tools to Ivanich so he can upgrade the equipment.

You know, brother, I'm actually a pretty good technician. I can fix weapons and armor, and even do some upgrades! Well, I would, if I had decent tools. But where can you get them around here? Maybe you can help me get a simple set, huh?
I need a set of tools for rough work. It should have tools and oils for working with weapons. If you can get it for me, I'll be grateful, I might even pay you!.. Probably.
Great, man! Oh, sorry, I have nothing to pay you with. But I can give you a good discount!
Find %s for Ivanich
You need to bring Ivanich tools for delicate work. He needs a more complete set to carry out more complex equipment upgrades.
Hey dude, if you agree to get me a more complete set, you'll get an even bigger discount. Will you help me out, buddy?
I need tools for delicate work. There should be everything I need in there. You'll be like a brother to me if you get it for me!

Wow, thanks bro! Now I'm definitely going to get rich. Damn, I'm going to be successful!... If, of course, I don't miss this opportunity. But for now, I can't offer you anything better than a discount. Sorry, buddy.
Find %s for Ivanich
Ivanich needs %s. He needs a unique set to perform even more complex equipment upgrades.
Hey, guy, if you find something worthwhile, I'll give you a discount!
I need tools for calibration. There should be everything I need in them. You'll be like a brother to me if you get them for me!

Holy sh*t, thanks man! Now I'm definitely going to get rich. Damn, I'm going to be successful!... If, of course, I don't miss this opportunity. But for now, I can't offer you anything better than a discount. Sorry, friend.
